sn1.43:1: "Annamevābhinandanti,ubhaye devamānusā;Atha ko nāma so yakkho,yaṁ annaṁ nābhinandatī"ti.
sn1.43:2: "Ye naṁ dadanti saddhāya,vippasannena cetasā;Tameva annaṁ bhajati,asmiṁ loke paramhi ca.
sn1.43:3: Tasmā vineyya maccheraṁ,dajjā dānaṁ malābhibhū;Puññāni paralokasmiṁ,patiṭṭhā honti pāṇinan"ti.
